title: New: The Very Best – Super Mom Mixtape
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/theverybest.jpg "theverybest")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7532-new-the-very-best-super-mom-mixtape/attachment/theverybest)

**The Very Best’s** first Mixtape was fresh, exciting and above else a graceful blend of styles and cultures. Today they dropped their follow up. Full of guest appearances and some beautifully hopeful tones and lyrics, it’s a record that fits with this time of year perfectly. Download it [here.](http://www.theverybestmusic.com/)
